turns.content:
Subject: Follow-Up: Schedule a demo for AI

Hey Robert,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up on our previous conversation and see if you had a chance to watch the demo video that I sent over. As a reminder, our AI-powered platform can help you find decision-makers and increase your pipeline by creating fully validated contact lists with less than a 1% bounce rate.

I understand you might have some questions and doubts about how our tool can help your business, That's why I want to schedule a full demo so you can see Lasso in action and understand how it can help you increase your pipeline and find the decision-makers you're missing at companies like Walmart, Nike, Home Depot, and small to midsized transportation carriers.

Just like a good bottle of wine, our demo gets better with age. So, let's not let it go to waste, shall we? Let me know what your schedule looks like, and I'll work with you to schedule a time that works for you.

Best,
Marie

Try again but keep it to two paragraphs and put the humor somewhere in the first paragraph. In the second paragraph, don't use "Walmart, Nike, Home Depot, and small to midsized transportation carriers." use names of different but similar companies.

Hey Robert,

I hope you're not getting tired of hearing from me yet, because I'm like a dog with a bone when it comes to showing you the power of Lasso. Our AI is like a superhero sidekick for your sales team, helping you find the decision-makers you're missing and crush your quotas. 💪

So, let's schedule that demo and I'll show you how Lasso can help you find leads and drive conversions for companies like Amazon, UPS, and FedEx. Sound good?

Best,
Marie
For the three companies you select, think smaller scale. Those companies are too big

"Hey Robert,

I hope you're not avoiding me like the plague, just wanted to check in and make sure our previous emails didn't get lost in the post-holiday shuffle. In case they did, allow me to remind you of the awesomeness that is Lasso, our AI-powered tool that can help you find those hard-to-reach decision-makers at smaller transportation companies like XYZ and ABC.

Speaking of which, have you had a chance to check out the demo video I sent over? If so, I'd love to schedule a call to chat more in-depth about how Lasso can help your team drive conversions and procures leads for your specific industry. Let me know if that works for you!

Best,
Marie"
